texts.value: Phosphorylates MAP kinase p38. Seems to be active only in mitosis. May also play a role in the activation of lymphoid cells. When phosphorylated, forms a complex with TP53, leading to TP53 destabilization and attenuation of G2/M checkpoint during doxorubicin-induced DNA damage
Expressed in the testis and placenta. In the testis, restrictedly expressed in outer cell layer of seminiferous tubules
Phosphorylated; in a cell-cycle dependent manner at mitosis
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. MAP kinase kinase subfamily

features.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2)
Decrease in the binding to DLG1.
Decrease in the binding to DLG1.
